code:
flowchart TD
%% Define styles for different components (Infra_EtcdCluster)
    classDef ui fill:#007BFF,stroke:#003366,stroke-width:2px,color:#fff;
    classDef api fill:#28A745,stroke:#155724,stroke-width:2px,color:#fff;
    classDef command fill:#FFC107,stroke:#856404,stroke-width:2px,color:#000;
    classDef ai fill:#6F42C1,stroke:#3B0A91,stroke-width:2px,color:#fff;
    classDef media fill:#FD7E14,stroke:#A85600,stroke-width:2px,color:#fff;
    classDef memory fill:#DC3545,stroke:#721C24,stroke-width:2px,color:#fff;
    classDef group fill:#17A2B8,stroke:#0C5460,stroke-width:2px,color:#fff;
    classDef doc fill:#6C757D,stroke:#343A40,stroke-width:2px,color:#fff;
    classDef db fill:#20C997,stroke:#0F5132,stroke-width:2px,color:#fff;
    classDef infra fill:#343A40,stroke:#000,stroke-width:2px,color:#fff;



    subgraph "User Interfaces"
        TG[Infra_LoadBalancer]
        WA[Infra_RedisCache]
    end
    class TG,WA ui;

    subgraph "API Layer"
        FA[Infra_IngressController]
        MW[Infra_LoadBalancer]
        RT[Infra_LoadBalancer]
    end
    class FA,MW,RT api;

    subgraph "Command System"
        CH[Infra_IngressController]
        BCH[Infra_RedisCache]
        IMCH[Infra_WorkerNode]
        MDCH[Infra_LoadBalancer]
        DOCH[Infra_IngressController]
        EXCH[Infra_RedisCache]
        CBH[Infra_RedisCache]
        OWAC[Infra_IngressController]
    end
    class CH,BCH,IMCH,MDCH,DOCH,EXCH,CBH,OWAC command;

    subgraph "AI Model System"
        MC[Infra_WorkerNode]
        MH[Infra_WorkerNode]
        ORA[Infra_RedisCache]
        GA[Infra_LoadBalancer]
        DSA[Infra_RedisCache]
        SSM[Infra_EtcdCluster]
    end
    class MC,MH,ORA,GA,DSA,SSM ai;

    subgraph "Media & Multimodal"
        IP[Infra_WorkerNode]
        VP[Infra_LoadBalancer]
        MCE[Infra_IngressController]
        MM[Infra_IngressController]
        TAI[Infra_IngressController]
        FLI[Infra_IngressController]
    end
    class IP,VP,MCE,MM,TAI,FLI media;

    subgraph "Memory & Context"
        MMGR[Infra_EtcdCluster]
        MHMGR[Infra_RedisCache]
        CMGR[Infra_IngressController]
        KGR[Infra_RedisCache]
    end
    class MMGR,MHMGR,CMGR,KGR memory;

    subgraph "Group Collaboration"
        GCI[Infra_LoadBalancer]
        GCM[Infra_LoadBalancer]
        GSA[Infra_RedisCache]
    end
    class GCI,GCM,GSA group;

    subgraph "Document & Export"
        DP[Infra_EtcdCluster]
        SDE[Infra_WorkerNode]
        AIDG[Infra_RedisCache]
    end
    class DP,SDE,AIDG doc;

    subgraph "Database & Storage"
        DB[Infra_WorkerNode]
        CACHES[Infra_RedisCache]
    end
    class DB,CACHES db;

    subgraph "Infrastructure"
        DOCKER[Infra_WorkerNode]
        DCOMPOSE[Infra_RedisCache]
        ENV[Infra_RedisCache]
        PROC[Infra_IngressController]
    end
    class DOCKER,DCOMPOSE,ENV,PROC infra;

    %% Connections
    TG --> FA
    WA --> FA
    FA --> MW
    MW --> RT
    RT --> CH
    CH --> BCH
    CH --> IMCH
    CH --> MDCH
    CH --> DOCH
    CH --> EXCH
    CH --> CBH
    CH --> OWAC

    CH --> MC
    CH --> MH
    MH --> ORA
    MH --> GA
    MH --> DSA
    MH --> SSM

    CH --> IP
    CH --> VP
    CH --> MCE
    CH --> MM
    IMCH --> TAI
    IMCH --> FLI

    CH --> MMGR
    CH --> MHMGR
    CH --> CMGR
    CH --> KGR

    CH --> GCI
    GCI --> GCM
    GCI --> GSA

    CH --> DP
    DP --> SDE
    DP --> AIDG

    CH --> DB
    CH --> CACHES
    MMGR --> DB
    KGR --> DB

    FA --> DOCKER
    FA --> DCOMPOSE
    FA --> ENV
    FA --> PROC

    %% Group chat and memory
    TG --> GCI
    GCI --> CMGR
    GCI --> MMGR
    GCI --> KGR

    %% Export and document
    DOCH --> DP
    DP --> SDE
    DP --> AIDG

    %% Media
    IMCH --> IP
    IMCH --> TAI
    IMCH --> FLI

    %% AI Model selection
    MDCH --> MC
    MC --> MH
    MH --> ORA
    MH --> GA
    MH --> DSA

    %% Caching
    CH --> CACHES
    MMGR --> CACHES

    %% Database
    DB --> MMGR
    DB --> KGR

    %% Infrastructure
    DOCKER --> DCOMPOSE
    DOCKER --> ENV
    DOCKER --> PROC
